questions.question: You accidentally text the wrong person
You realize you forgot a friend's birthday
answers: I would never get in this scenario

questions.question: You overhear someone misrepresenting your opinion
You're at a restaurant and your order is completely wrong
answers: Wait for someone else to step in

questions.question: You realize your friend is upset in a group scenario, but you aren't sure why
You accepted plans but last minute don't feel like going
Someone gives you a gift you don't need or want
You're in a group and you notice someone is uncomfortable/upset by the current conversation
You're in a group and notice that someone is being left out of the conversation
You see a friend struggling but you're unsure if they want help
You see a stranger struggling but you're unsure if they want help
Somoeone tells a story you know is untrue
You make a plan and others start changing it without asking
Someone threatens your friend with physical violence
Someone you know is clearly hiding something from you, but you're not sure if it's serious
Someone compliments you in a way that feels slightly off
You find an old notebook tucked behind a shelf in a café, filled with what look like personal notes and sketches. No one nearby claims it
While on a long walk, you notice a small path that branches off the main trail. It's not marked on any map you checked earlier.
A friend excitedly tells you a story, but you realize halfway through that you already know a crucial part they don't.
You overhear two strangers talking about something that directly relates to a project you're working on
You're at an event, and someone you vaguely recognize waves at you with clear enthusiasm. You cannot remember who they are
Late at night, your phone buzzes with a message preview that seems urgent, but you can't see the whole thing
You're cooking something new, and halfway through you notice the instructions don't match the ingredients you have
A song you’ve never heard starts playing, but you instantly recognize the lyrics.
You get an email from someone with your exact name but a different domain.
You walk into a room and everyone suddenly stops talking.
A cashier gives you too much change and doesn't seem to notice.
You discover a door in a building you've been in many times but never noticed before.
You notice that an item in a store is marked far cheaper than it should be.
You recognize someone on the street
Your name is called in a waiting room, but multiple people stand up.
You sit down in a public place and someone immediately sits unusually close to you.
You make a comment and someone reacts far more strongly than expected.
You hear a loud noise somewhere in your home that you can't immediately explain.
Someone sends you a message clearly meant for someone else.
You find a message written in chalk on the sidewalk that seems directed at you personally.
You receive two contradictory instructions from two equally authoritative people.
You open your front door and find a delivery with no label at all.
You discover an old photo on your phone with a friend you haven't talked to in years.
You find a shirt you like online but the reviews are very mixed.
You're in a group setting and everyone else decides they want to do something you hate.
You wake up earlier than planned and feel more alert than usual.
You didn't hear what someone said but you already asked them to repeat themselves twice
You're trying to remember the name of something and the answer is on the tip of your tongue.
You're invited to join a group activity you’ve never tried before.
